title: Revenue of the BSH Group 2003 to 2018
summary: In general Revenue in billion euros has rose over the Year.
Revenue in billion euros is roughly constant from 2011 to 2012, and lastly slightly increasing from 2012 to 2015.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2014 and 2015.
The highest Revenue in billion euros, of value 12.6 was reached at Year 2015
The lowest Revenue in billion euros, of value 9.65 was reported at Year 2011
